name: Race Change: infinite racing
description:
Do you enjoy 2D retro racing games? Want a simple, yet fun racing car game? Well, you must try Race Change Infinite racing 2019: 2D Retro Racer. Experience high-octane experience on this simulation racing game; in this game you must run between cities with a car, avoid many cars, collect points & more. It’s a real thrilling 2d infinite racing game where fast reaction under pressure will lead you to the best scores.

🕹️HOW TO PLAY

  • Tilt your screen to control the car.
  • Avoid crashes with other cars
  • Collect coins along the way
  • 🚗 CHANGE SIDE RACING CHALLENGE This endless racer 2d old retro style game is sure to challenge your reflexes and racing skills with the variety of car racing obstacles and high speed driving. You are on a highway which is filled with high speed cars and police cars.
  • Avoid the cars, collect the coins, use the gas pedal to drive in highest speed possible and enjoy an exciting 2D racing game. Now go, race on the highway and always try to improve your score. Have fun in a truly fun racing game in 2D
